item.title: CAPITAL SOUTHWEST CORP 10-K
item.description: CAPITAL SOUTHWEST CORP, which is in the Missing_from_sec_filing_header [None] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 24, 2022 had 63120 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
